findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may expose the Disclosing Party to risks of misuse or unauthorized disclosure of confidential information without recourse to verify compliance.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: While indemnification exists, its limitation to legal requirements may not fully protect the Disclosing Party against all potential claims arising from breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims arising from breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of specific intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes over ownership and use of intellectual property developed during the agreement.
